attributes.action: Do Not Call a General Election
attributes.additional_details: I believe the current Labour Government have made some tough decisions, done the hard thing first, and made a good start.
attributes.background: I would like the democratically elected government to remain in place.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do Not Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703000
